title: Doctor Voodoo: Avenger of the Supernatural (Trade Paperback)
description:
Launching from the pages of New Avengers, Jericho Drumm assumes the role of Marvel’s new Sorcerer Supreme as DOCTOR VOODOO! Having foreseen an unimaginable evil that will soon envelop the Marvel Universe, the Eye of Agamotto has passed the mantle of Sorcerer Supreme on to the one man who has the unique gifts to stave off the coming darkness -- but is Doctor Voodoo ready for the momentous duty as avenger of the supernatural? As Jericho begins to grapple with his colossal new position, malevolent beings of vast power see his arrival as an opportunity to strike. Plus, take a trip through the voodoo virtuoso’s career in a special presentation of STRANGE TALES #169-170, fully remastered with modern coloring. Collecting DOCTOR VOODOO: AVENGER OF THE SUPERNATURAL #1-5 and DOCTOR VOODOO: THE ORIGIN OF JERICHO DRUMM.
Rated T  …$16.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-4409-0
